snippet.title: Wolfenstein | Blade of Agony Chapter 3 - The Final Confrontation (Trailer)
snippet.description:
The war is balancing on a knife's edge. It's not taking much longer for one side to win. Both sides have exhausted their forces, their morale is down to earth, and it's just a question of time when the war ends. 

Wolfenstein | Blade of Agony's Chapter 3 (including an completely overhauled Chapter 1+2) will be released on April 30th, 2021. Are you ready to get psyched?

Video by Twitter @theswabiangamer | https://twitter.com/theswabiangamer
Thanks so much for your effort and dedication!
